name: John Lemon's Haunted Jaunt (CultivatedDavid)
description:
Trying to get into game development/computer programming, so I made this from the popular creator kit to learn C# and Unity Engine. Feel free to leave any comments for tips! (Ik there are a lot of bugs) 

Use W-A-S-D to move and avoid the ghosts and gargoyles as you try and escape the haunted mansion!
